thread.title: Jose Mourinho refuses to guarantee Wayne Rooney will end season at Manchester United amid links to China
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho refuses to guarantee Wayne Rooney will end season at Manchester United amid links to China

author: David McDonnell
title: Jose Mourinho refuses to guarantee Wayne Rooney will end season at Manchester United amid links to China
text:
Sport Jose Mourinho refuses to guarantee Wayne Rooney will end season at Manchester United amid links to China Rooney has been linked with a big-money move to China after losing his place in the United side this term and Mourinho says the player will make the final decision Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jose Mourinho has admitted he cannot guarantee Wayne Rooney will be at Manchester United beyond next week. 
Rooney has been linked with a mega-money move to the Chinese Super League before next Tuesday's transfer deadline. 
And Mourinho , speaking ahead of United's Europa League tie against St Etienne, said he could not give any guarantees about his captain's future. 
"You have to ask him," said Mourinho. "I can't guarantee that, how can I guarantee he will be here next season? 
"If he one day he leaves the club, it’s not because I want him to leave. Mourinho and Rooney during training (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) Wayne Rooney walks off after a match (Photo: REUTERS) 
"I would never push or try to push a legend out of this club to another destiny. 
"So you have to ask him if he sees himself leaving. I don’t want him to leave." Mourinho during training (Photo: REUTERS) The United boss looks on (Photo: PA) 
Rooney, 31, has another 16 months of his United contract to run, with the option for an extra year. 
The forward has not played since United's 4-0 FA Cup win over Wigan on January 29 and has not travelled with the squad for the Europa League tie. poll loading Will Wayne Rooney finish his career with Manchester United? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
